Context

We are writing about art.

We want to be better artists. We want to go see art. We want to respond to art. We want to be better writers. We want to think about art. We want to make art about art. We want to write about art.

We're looking for collaborators if this looks like something you might be in to.

Email us at context (at) txetnoc (dot) com.

A Secret Art Email!

Sign up and we will send you emails about the stuff we post, probably around once a month.
